borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal">No above ground new development shall commence until the developer provides the Local Planning Authority with details around the external facing materials for the development. The full details shall then be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing. The development shall only be implemented in accordance with the approved details and to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.<br></p>

Notwithstanding the provisions of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no development falling within CLASS A in Part 1 of Schedule 2 to that Order shall be carried out without the prior written permission of the Local Planning Authority.

The development hereby permitted shall not be occupied until the 2 cycle parking spaces outside the dwelling have been fully implemented.  Thereafter, the cycle parking facilities shall be permanently retained for the duration of the development.

Minor amendments may be agreed in writing from time to time by the Local Planning Authority.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

- DRAWING XXX REV XX DATED XX
- USE [SHIFT]+[ENTER] FOR REGULAR LINE SPACING
- USE [ENTER] FOR LARGER LINE SPACING

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Demolition of existing burnt structure and construction of a new two storey 2x bedroom dwelling

constraints_details.result: 8 Stratford Close, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM10 9TT
